Package org.semanticweb.rulewerk.client.shell

Interface ShellConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultShellConfiguration
    public interface ShellConfiguration
    Interface for providing I/O resources for an interactive shell: terminal, terminal prompt, and line reader
    Author:
    Irina Dragoste

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      org.jline.reader.LineReader buildLineReader​(org.jline.terminal.Terminal terminal, Collection<String> commands)
      Provides a line reader that reads user input from the given terminal.
      String buildPrompt​(org.jline.terminal.Terminal terminal)
      Provides the prompt text (with colour and style) to be displayed on the given terminal.
      org.jline.terminal.Terminal buildTerminal()
      Provides an I/O terminal for the interactive shell.

    • Method Detail

      • buildLineReader

        org.jline.reader.LineReader buildLineReader​(org.jline.terminal.Terminal terminal,
                                            Collection<String> commands)
        Provides a line reader that reads user input from the given terminal. The line reader offers tab-completion for the given list of command names.
        Parameters:
        terminal - terminal to read from.
        commands - list of command names recognized by the interactive shell.
        Returns:
        a line reader for interacting with the shell terminal.

      • buildTerminal

        org.jline.terminal.Terminal buildTerminal()
                                   throws IOException
        Provides an I/O terminal for the interactive shell.
        Returns:
        the interactive shell terminal.
        Throws:
        IOException - when the terminal cannot be built

      • buildPrompt

        String buildPrompt​(org.jline.terminal.Terminal terminal)
        Provides the prompt text (with colour and style) to be displayed on the given terminal.
        Parameters:
        terminal - terminal for the prompt to be displayed on
        Returns:
        the prompt text with embedded style.
